description: Unified task registry — single source of truth for all OPAI tasks (human + agent). Sources: email, discord, agent reports, manual.

(2) Logo: price is being bundled into the final price — delegating logo task to Denise separately (see t-20260212-053). (3) Highlight boxes: unclear what Eric means by 'highlight boxes' — he said 'I don't know what you call those things'. Need to check if an image was attached to the 'Re: AI pic' email. Draft response exists in email system — update with these answers before sending.

t-20260212-058.title: Email checker: add attachment download + content extraction
t-20260212-058.description: Email checker (tools/email-checker/index.js) currently fetches bodyStructure and source but has zero attachment handling. NEEDED: (1) Parse bodyStructure for Content-Disposition: attachment parts. (2) Fetch and save attachments to disk (e.g., Clients/<name>/). (3) For .docx files, extract text content and present 1:1. (4) For other files, provide a summary. (5) When referencing emails, provide Gmail search URLs instead of local draft paths. This was identified while working on Westberg tasks — bio.docx and book reviews were unreachable because only email metadata was stored.
